name: EDD Tab Manager
author: Igor BeniÄ‡

sections.description:
Easily create Tabs under for Easy Digital Downloads. Define your tabs and enter tab information for each product separately. Help customers with categorized content so they can easily find the most important product information they need.

You can add as many tabs as you want. If a tab content does not exist for a product, that tab will not be displayed on the front side.

Some examples of Tabs that might be useful for Downloads:

  • Specifications
  • Technical Details
  • Reviews
  • Contents (of Zipped file)
  • Refund Policy
  • Other Policies
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly or download it here and upload the .ZIP file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Downloads > Tabs screen to create Tabs
  4. Go to each product and enter tab content
sections.faq:
Can I add unlimited Tabs?

Yes you can. But do consider your own theme layout.

Can I add tabs to specific categories or products?

Not yet. That is currently under development.

Where can I change the position of the Tabs?

You can go to Easy Digital Downloads > Settings > Tabs.
sections.changelog:
1.3.1 – 2022-04-17

  • Security Fix

1.3.0

  • Adding checkboxes to exclude tabs per download
  • Adding Settings under Easy Digital Downloads > Settings > Tabs for displaying tabs before or after the content
  • Adding Default tabs content

1.2

  • Fixing content bug where tabs were replacing the content
  • Improving Styles

1.1

  • Added shortcode support
  • Added Freemius to provide advanced features via feedback

1.0

  • Initial upload
